Public Member Functions

Domain Class Reference
MPI Communication

Detailed Description

Decomposition of the system into domains associated with processors.

Definition at line 30 of file Domain.h.

#include <Domain.h>

Definition at line 311 of file Domain.h.

Referenced by Exchanger::exchangeAtoms(), and Exchanger::update().

int shift ( int  i,
int  j 
) const [inline]

Shift to be applied to sent coordinates in transfer (i, j).

When communicating an atomic position that is stored on the sending processsor as x = {x[0], x[1], x[2]}, the value of coordinate x[i] should be sent as x[i] - shift(i, j)*length[i] during transfer (i, j), where length[i] is the length of the unit cell in direction i.

Parameters:
iindex of Cartesian direction 0 <= i < Dimension
jindex for positive (j = 0) or negative (j = 1) transfer

Definition at line 320 of file Domain.h.

Referenced by Exchanger::exchangeAtoms(), and Exchanger::update().

Definition at line 237 of file Domain.h.

double domainBound ( int  i,
int  j 
) const

Get one boundary of the domain owned by this processor.

This processor owns a domain in which coordinate x[i] lies in the range domainBound(i, 0) < x[i] < domainBound(i, 1) for all 0 <= i < Dimension.

Parameters:
iindex of Cartesian direction 0 <= i < Dimension
jindex for lower (j=0) or upper (j=1) boundary.
Returns:
boundary coordinate value
